name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: FreeShortURL - White-Label URL Shortener, QR Code Maker & Link Tracker

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create white-label short links, QR codes, and track performance effortlessly with FreeShortURL. Boost your digital strategy!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The FreeShortURL Chrome Extension is your ultimate tool for managing links, creating custom short URLs, designing personalized QR codes, and tracking performance. Packed with advanced features, this extension is perfect for businesses, marketers, and influencers to simplify and optimize their digital presence. https://freeshorturl.com/

✨ Key Features of FreeShortURL Chrome Extension

🔗 White-Label URL Shortener
Create branded short URLs using your custom domain for a professional look. Design personalized landing pages to boost user engagement.

🌐 Customizable Bio Profiles
Consolidate all your important links in a single, shareable bio profile. Customize designs with themes, colors, and social media widgets. Monitor bio link performance in real time.

📲 Advanced QR Code Generator
Generate QR codes with custom designs, including logos and colors. Track scans and engagement metrics for detailed insights.

📊 Comprehensive Analytics
Monitor clicks, user locations, devices, and link performance. Gain insights with UTM parameters, geotargeting, and pixel tracking integration.

🎯 Campaign & Link Rotator Tools
Group links into campaigns and view aggregated statistics. Rotate links dynamically for A/B testing or multiple destinations.

📽️ Splash & Overlay Pages
Create custom splash pages for media links and add actionable CTAs.

📱 Smart Deep Linking
Automatically redirect users to mobile apps or prompt app installation. Enhance engagement with seamless app interactions.

🖥️ Powerful REST API
Integrate URL shortening and link tracking into your own applications. Extend and customize functionalities for business needs.

⚡ Seamless Integrations
Shorten links directly from Slack, Zapier, and WordPress. Automate workflows and notifications effortlessly.

👥 Who Is It For?

📈 Marketers: Optimize campaigns with branded links and advanced analytics.
🏢 Businesses: Manage links effectively with custom domains and seamless integrations.
🌟 Influencers: Consolidate and share all your important links effortlessly.
💻 Developers: Use the API to integrate link shortening and tracking into your applications.

🔑 How to Get an API Key?

1️⃣ Sign Up at https://freeshorturl.com/user/register.
2️⃣ Go to your Dashboard, click on Tools, and select Developer API, or visit directly at https://freeshorturl.com/developers.
3️⃣ For support, contact us at contact@freeshorturl.com.

🔧 Why Install FreeShortURL Chrome Extension?

✅ Save Time: Shorten links and create QR codes instantly without leaving your browser.
✅ Boost Branding: Use white-label features and custom domains to build trust and credibility.
✅ Track Everything: Gain deep insights into link performance and optimize campaigns effortlessly.
✅ Enhance Engagement: Drive traffic with personalized bio profiles, splash pages, and deep links.

👥 Who Is It For?

📈 Marketers: Optimize campaigns with branded links and advanced analytics.
🏢 Businesses: Manage links effectively with custom domains and seamless integrations.
